name: r3BALL
description:
Hello friends, this project that I set out to make a clone of the "Going Balls" game has turned into a very different game. I did this with great pleasure while developing the project. I hope you will like it. Good Luck!

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Medium

CONTROLS

W-A-S-D / Arrow Keys

TIPS

- White Lights are checkpoints.

- There are checkpoints in front of the trampolines, if you can't jump successfully, jump down and you will be revived in front of the trampoline.

- A-D / LEFT - RIGHT Arrow keys, you can speed up the ball a little by pressing these keys. It's actually a mistake, but I left it on purpose. It both increases the difficulty a little and adds extra speed.

Resources

Trampoline Sound - Freesound - "trampoline bounce.wav" by zepurple

Ballon Burst -  Freesound - "Balloon_Burst_Pop_2.wav" by Terhen

Trigger Beep - Freesound - "Bomb Countdown Beeps" by snakebarney

Ball Machine Shoot - Helix Jump Destroy Sound

Game Music - Unity Prototype 3 

Materials - Textures for 3D, graphic design and Photoshop!

All models are made by me in blender and unity.
